es.description: Integra wallets de criptomonedas en tu app de forma rápida y segura.

features.name: Conexión instantánea
features.description: Vincula tu wallet en segundos con una experiencia moderna y sencilla.

features.name: Basado en Shadcn
features.description: El componente está basado en shadcn, permitiendo la reutilización de componentes.

features.name: Compatible con múltiples wallets
features.description: Funciona con MetaMask, WalletConnect, Coinbase Wallet y muchas más.

features.name: Totalmente personalizable
features.description: Ajusta el diseño y las funciones según las necesidades de tu proyecto.

en.description: Integrate cryptocurrency wallets into your app quickly and securely.

features.name: Instant Connection
features.description: Link your wallet in seconds with a modern and simple experience.

features.name: Shadcn Based
features.description: The component is based on shadcn, allowing for the reuse of components.

features.name: Multi-Wallet Compatible
features.description: Works with MetaMask, WalletConnect, Coinbase Wallet, and many more.

features.name: Fully Customizable
features.description: Adjust the design and functions according to your project's needs.
